text: Tama koros Ta-Addunyâ manol faylâ guran kee meqe xagar xagô fayxih yaceen maalih ceelallo gibdi caacayay xabca edde taniy sinni Nafsi Yallih Amrih cinat yudlume marih Buqret Boodeeh finqiseh inna kinni, tonnaah koros Abitteh tan meqe taama keenik finqitteh, Yalli wohut ken madlammo, kinnih immay usun sinni Nafsi koroosannuu kee uma taamat yudlumen
